mapper.select: select pa_no, p_name, pr_01, b_count, o_deliveryname, o_deliveryaddress, o_delivery, to_char(pa_date,'YY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS')as pa_date from pay inner join orders on pay.o_no = orders.o_no inner join basket on orders.b_no = basket.b_no inner join product on basket.p_code = product.p_code inner join price on product.pr_no = price.pr_no inner join customer on customer.c_num = basket.c_num where c_id = #{c_id} order by pa_date
